---
engine: julia
title: A paired reader
---


## Overview

Select a Biblical passage and pair any two of the four versions in the Complutensian to read the two versions juxtaposed to each other.

## Notebook

:::{.callout-warning title="Uses local resources"}
This notebook uses data in local files, and expects to be run files from a copy of [this github repository](https://github.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts).
:::

- [HTML version](./pairedreader.html) (readable in a web browser)
- [Pluto notebook](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/neelsmith/complutensian-texts/refs/heads/main/pluto/reading/pairedreader.jl) (download and open in Pluto)
